Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants Sean O'Brien additional service credit with the New York state and local employees' retirement system
Summary: Grants Sean O'Brien additional service credit with the New York state and local employees' retirement system for the period beginning January 16, 2003 and ending on May 23, 2003, for his enrollment in the Basic Course for Police Officers at the State University of New York College of Technology at Canton.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to granting Sean O'Brien additional service credit with the New York state and local employees' retirement system
